## RadioBrowserApi.buildRequest() method

Builds request to the API

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
protected buildRequest(endPoint: string, search?: string, query?: Query | AdvancedStationQuery | StationQuery, addHideBrokenParam?: boolean): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  endPoint | string | API endpoint |
|  search | string | Search term |
|  query | [Query](./radio-browser-api.query.md) \| [AdvancedStationQuery](./radio-browser-api.advancedstationquery.md) \| [StationQuery](./radio-browser-api.stationquery.md) | Query |
|  addHideBrokenParam | boolean | Hide broken stations from the results |

<b>Returns:</b>

string

Built request string
